Subscription.Description: Process Execution and Command-line Auditing Events
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <!-- Inspired by Microsoft Documentation and/or IADGOV --> <Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <!-- Command line auditing is disabled by default. Enable it via https://goo.gl/Gua8oj --> <!-- 4688: Process Created --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4688)]]</Select> <!-- 4699: Process Terminated --> <Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4689)]]</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
